name: Fun Of Magnetic Car Driving
description:
This Fun Of Magnetic Car Driving game provide pick and drop service to passengers in modern city . You can enjoy the Fun Of Magnetic Car Driving in the beautiful city to transport the passengers fast at their destination. Download this simulation game from app store, drive fast and careful with your driving skills and compete the entire traffic rivals with your advance and crazy driving.

Fun Of Magnetic Car Driving: Features
Physics based realistic simulation game.
Extremely smooth game play and amazing city driving experience.
Changing camera view
3D HD graphics
